fields.name: Drum Sessions Vol. 1
fields.description: A smooth collection of drum loops, with BPM's ranging from 74.00 to 124.00. Use to flavour your tracks with a live feel.

fields.name: Drum Sessions Vol. 2
fields.description: A smooth collection of drum loops, with BPM's ranging from 74.00 to 124.00. Use these to flavour your tracks with a live feel.

fields.name: Colossus Filters
fields.description: Embed this throughout your tracks to create massive atmospheres using Colossus Filters' ambient sounds

fields.name: Django Guitar Loops
fields.description: Soulful studio recordings of electric guitar riffs, written to bring life to any track that utilises them. Speed them up, slow them down, or cut them as desired, these loops are guaranteed to impress.

fields.name: Grooves
fields.description: Experience these hard hitting bass lines that can be used to give your track that missing element to take it to the next level.
